title: [FEATURE] Generate the SkiaSharp from the C++ Code
body:
This is a top-level issue for the discussion for generating all the bits of the SkiaSharp APIs.

This is a fairly complex task with all the platforms that are supported, the compatibility requirements and other things. However, this probably needs to be done at some point.

 - [ ] Generate the C API (#1003)
 - [ ] Generate the C# API (#1002)
